sentence: Unilever PLC ( UL ) will begin trading ex-dividend on November 01, 2018.
A cash dividend payment of $0.444 per share is scheduled to be paid on December 05, 2018.
Shareholders who purchased UL prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This represents an -0.89% decrease from the prior dividend payment.
At the current stock price of $53.62, the dividend yield is 3.31%.
The previous trading day's last sale of UL was $53.62, representing a -7.66% decrease from the 52 week high of $58.07 and a 5.68% increase over the 52 week low of $50.74.
UL is a part of the Basic Industries sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever NV ( UN ).
Zacks Investment Research reports UL's forecasted earnings growth in 2018 as 6.32%, compared to an industry average of 6.9%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the UL Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
